name: UFOdle
description:
This is an X-Files version of the popular game Wordle! The truth is out there.

Instructions on how to play Wordle here.

Note: The words for UFOdle range from 5 to 7 letters. They could be character names, relevant concepts, episode titles, monsters, or X-Files writers, directors, or actors. 

Currently, 6 or 7 letter words will only show up if you guess a word from the answer list. The list of possible words can be found here.

My twitter is @themeghan_m if you need hints or if you want to follow a fellow X-Phile!

Please consider donating to support the game.

Have fun, and remember...trust no one...
